title: Latin Americans And the Island
body:
The implication that Latin Americans are recent immigrants to Long Island couldn't be further from the facts 
(''Immigrants Adjust to Life on L.I.''). In fact, Brentwood and the surrounding areas as far as Shirley and beyond 
have the second largest Latin American population next to New York City. It is significant because Hispanic people 
constitute a distinct culture on Long Island because of their close ethnic ties to one another.

MARIA STANNISH, Northport
